page.title: 15MY HOUSE , MY GARDEN.RIPLEY
page.content: I live at 27 Devonshire Ave,Ripley. My House,built in 1977,is a four-bedroomed detached brick house with a living room,dining room and kitchen.From my house we can see the A38 and Crich Stand.My house is named La Casa,which is Mexican for the castle.A double glazed door leads to the garden.In addition to three lawns, we grow flowers such as roses and tulips and some fruit trees in the back garden. I live at Ashleigh House,Henry Street, Ripley,Derbyshire.My large brick built detached house was built in 1864.It has four bedrooms,a sitting room, dining room,kitchen and a downstairs cloakroom.Upstairs,leading from a corridor,is a balcony where we grow potted plants.The front door has a large porch.My garden is half an acre with lawns,flower beds,and vegetables.
